ai-kv22.7:1.1_0: There is no sorrow for function,
ai-kv22.7:1.4_0: “Mendicants, the killing of living creatures is developed and cultivated so as to lead to hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.”
ai-kv22.7:1.7_0: Therefore there is in the western one, the other abidings then.
ai-kv22.7:2.1_0: There is no sorrow for function,
ai-kv22.7:2.4_0: “Mendicants, when cultivated, developed, and practiced, leads to hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-kv22.7:2.5_0: The minimum result it leads to for a human being is rivalry and enmity.
ai-kv22.7:2.6_0: The minimum result it leads to for a human being is false accusations.
ai-kv22.7:2.7_0: The minimum result it leads to for a human being is being divided against friends. ...
ai-kv22.7:2.8_0: The minimum result it leads to for a human being is hearing disagreeable things. ...
ai-kv22.7:2.9_0: The minimum result it leads to for a human being is easy to admonish ...
ai-kv22.7:2.10_0: The minimum result it leads to for a human being is madness.”
ai-kv22.7:2.13_0: Therefore there is in the western one, the other abidings then.
ai-kv22.7:3.1_0: There is no sorrow for function,
ai-kv22.7:3.4_0: “Mendicants, when wrong view is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial. It leads to hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.”
ai-kv22.7:3.7_0: Therefore there is in the western one, the other abidings then.
ai-kv22.7:4.1_0: There is no sorrow for function,
ai-kv22.7:4.8_0: Therefore there is in the western one, the other abidings then.
ai-kv22.7:5.1_0: There is no sorrow for function,
ai-kv22.7:5.4_0: “Mendicants, when right view is developed and cultivated it culminates in the deathless.
ai-kv22.7:5.7_0: Therefore there is in the western one, the other abidings then.
ai-kv22.7:6.1_0: There is no sorrow for function,
ai-kv22.7:6.4_0: “Mendicants, when right thought is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful. ...”
ai-kv22.7:6.5_0: right immersion is developed and cultivated it culminates with the deathless.”
ai-kv22.7:6.8_0: Therefore there is in the western one, the other abidings then.
ai-kv22.7:6.9_0: The discussion on the essences is finished.
